content: white star in the middle bring the thread to the next white tip and place two or three chain stitches towards the peel turn the work around and continue on the other side work two or three chain stitches back towards the center - make sure that the yarn on the underside comes to lie above the chain stitches already made continue in this way until all segments are embroidered on both sides weave in end copyright susanne vetterkind you may spread the fun by sharing the pattern and you may make as many zesty citrus coasters as you like but please for personal use only enjoy zesty citrus coasters finishing pressing your coasters with steam on cotton setting or appropriate setting for the yarn you used enhances the appearance of your coasters and gives them a smooth and even look have fun and enjoy copyright susanne vetterkind you may spread the fun by sharing the pattern and you may make as many zesty citrus coasters as you like but please for personal use only enjoy
